methods: abstract Enumeration<byte[]> getIds() Returns an iterable of all session identifiers in this session context.
abstract SSLSession getSession(byte[] sessionId) Returns the session for the specified session identifier.
abstract int getSessionCacheSize() Returns the size of the session cache for this session context.
abstract int getSessionTimeout() Returns the timeout for sessions in this session context.
abstract void setSessionCacheSize(int size) Sets the size of the session cache for this session context.
abstract void setSessionTimeout(int seconds) Sets the timeout for sessions in this context.
